attributes.action: Allow voters in the EU referendum to change their vote from Leave to Remain.
attributes.background: Following the result of the EU referendum voters have expressed their desire to change their vote from Leave to Remain without understanding the question at hand. As the result was so close (a difference of 1,269,501) - they should be allowed to revise or revoke their vote as it was cast in error.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
